project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password incorporating uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters, with a user-configurable length.

task.name: Implement password generation logic that includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
Create a function to accept user input for password length.
Implement input validation for the password length to ensure it's a valid number and within a reasonable range.
Write tests for the password generation logic and input functions.
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure that they function correctly.
